subject: Interscholastic Athletics
Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The lanky Knights of Lone Peak are the No. 1 high school team in the nation. And they have not just been beating their opponents. They’ve been crushing them.
snippet: The lanky Knights of Lone Peak are the No. 1 high school team in the nation. And they have not just been beating their opponents. They’ve been crushing them.
